citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
During this inspection, the written program of veterinary care was unavailable for review. It is important to review the
program of veterinary care to ensure that the exhibited animals are receiving the appropriate veterinary care for their
health and well-being.
Each dealer, exhibitor, intermediate handler, or carrier, shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials:
(a)(2) To examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part;
Facility should have necessary documentation available for review during inspections.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: MARCH 28, 2025
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
During this inspection, the written program of veterinary care was unavailable for review. It is important to review the 
program of veterinary care to ensure that the exhibited animals are receiving the appropriate veterinary care for their 
health and well-being. 
 
Each dealer, exhibitor, intermediate handler, or carrier, shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials: 
 
(a)(2) To examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part; 
 
Facility should have necessary documentation available for review during inspections. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY: MARCH 28, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
